conbody.p: (a) The contracting officer shall insert the provision at (48 CFR) AIDAR 752.219–70 in all unrestricted solicitations exceeding $550,000 ($1,000,000 for construction) that offer subcontracting opportunities.
(b) The contracting officer shall insert the clause at (48 CFR) AIDAR 752.219–71 in all contracts where the prime contractor has signed a Mentor-Protégé Agreement with USAID.
